T16TD4387E:317b-1: a'arya n'a g'ardzu na pra ni dh'a na n'a ma /
T16TD4387E:317b-3: 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi smon lam zhes bya ba //
T16TD4387E:317b-4: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T16TD4387E:317b-5: 'khor bar 'khor tshe skye gnas thams cad du //
T16TD4387E:317b-6: chos la bzod pa ma thob bar du ni //
T16TD4387E:317b-7: ngan song gsum du nam yang mi skye zhing //
T16TD4387E:317b-8: mtho ris mi yi lus su skye bar shog / mtho ris mi yi lus su skyes nas kyang //
T16TD4387E:317b-9: sdig spyod rgyal por ma skye blon po dang //
T16TD4387E:317b-10: dmag dpon zhal che gcod par bdag ma skye //
T16TD4387E:317b-11: khe byed til brdung chang 'tshong rkun po dang //
T16TD4387E:317b-12: bran dang bran mo'i lus su bdag ma skye //
T16TD4387E:317b-13: dge slong ga nas la dbang byed bdag po dang //
T16TD4387E:317b-14: gnas brtan las byed pa dang ngan khrims pa //
T16TD4387E:317b-15: dge skos gtsang sbyor ba dang dam bzhag pa //
T16TD4387E:317b-16: gang zag las byed rnams su bdag ma skye //
T16TD4387E:317b-17: mtha' 'khob kla klo'i skye ba'i yul rnams dang //
T16TD4387E:317b-18: glen lkugs 'on long phrag dog can rnams dang //
T16TD4387E:317b-19: mu stegs log lta bram ze'i rigs rnams dang //
T16TD4387E:317b-20: rigs ngan shan pa'i rigs su bdag ma skye //
T16TD4387E:318a-0: byang chub ma thob par du rtag par bdag / dam chos spyod pa'i lus su skye bar shog / dam chos spyod pa'i lus @318a * //
T16TD4387E:318a-2: mi dge gzhan gyi dbang du mi 'gyur zhing //
T16TD4387E:318a-3: tshe la nad kyis bar chad med pa dang //
T16TD4387E:318a-4: skyes ma thag tu chos dang phrad par shog / skyes ma thag tu chos dang phrad nas kyang //
T16TD4387E:318a-5: mnyan bsam bsgom pas rig pa'i rgyud sbyangs nas //
T16TD4387E:318a-6: ting 'dzin rtse gcig sems la dbang thob ste //
T16TD4387E:318a-7: rnam shes drug po yul la g-yengs ma gyur //
T16TD4387E:318a-8: lus kyi yan lag rgyas shing skyon med de //
T16TD4387E:318a-9: dbang po ma nyams rigs mtho bskur ba'i gnas //
T16TD4387E:318a-10: sangs rgyas chos kun rdzogs par byed pa dang //
T16TD4387E:318a-11: gzhon nur rab byung tshul khrims ldan pa dang //
T16TD4387E:318a-12: dge bshes mchog rnams rtag tu bsten byed cing //
T16TD4387E:318a-13: sa bcu rim gyis bgrod rnams thogs med de //
T16TD4387E:318a-14: bla med byang chub myur du thob par shog / bla med byang chub myur du thob nas kyang //
T16TD4387E:318a-15: rgyud drug 'khor ba'i sems can thams cad la //
T16TD4387E:318a-16: bsdu pa rnam bzhis 'gro don byed par shog / slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i smon lam zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
